interview_decisions.problem: Missing functionality - BLE/LoRa/etc unusable despite abstraction existing
interview_decisions.success_criteria: Production ready - full multi-transport with tested BLE, constrained engine, docs
interview_decisions.integration: Modify existing layers - wire through Node → P2pEndpoint → NatTraversalEndpoint
interview_decisions.error_handling: Dedicated error types with transport-specific context
interview_decisions.async_model: Fully async (tokio) - concurrent receive on multiple transports
interview_decisions.documentation: Full public API docs with implementation guides
interview_decisions.priority: Core wiring first, then addresses, then BLE, then constrained engine

implementation_guidance.step1: Pass TransportRegistry through Node → P2pEndpoint constructors and store it in P2pEndpoint
implementation_guidance.step2: Update send/receive path to use registry: loop over registry.online_providers() to bind/listen, select providers based on ProtocolEngine/capabilities when dialing
implementation_guidance.step3: Teach NatTraversalEndpoint and peer adverts to include TransportAddr + capability summaries
